question.en: How useful was the information or service you received? Please choose (1.USEFUL,) (2.NOT USEFUL)

question.eng: Okay. What information or service  would you want us to provide. Please type your response:
Well noted. How easy was it for you to access the information you required? Please choose (1.EASY,) (2.HARD)
You're almost done! How can i make it easier? Please type your response:
Thank you. How would you rate your overall experience with our services? Please choose (1.EXCELLENT,) (2.POOR)
Lastly, how can i make our experience better? Please type your response:
Thank you very much for your feedback. We appreciate your support. Please choose from (1.MAIN MENU) to continue using the service.
